sentences.en: " I do appreciate good advice so much,'said Scarlett, with all the sarcasm she could muster.
sentences.cn: " 我非常欣赏好的忠告, "思嘉用尽可能强烈的讽刺口吻说.

sentences.en: Does the new manager pass muster?
sentences.cn: 新的经理还过得去 吗 ?

sentences.en: Each character is valid by itself, yet the whole may not pass muster.
sentences.cn: 每个单词本身是有效的, 但可能总体验证通不过.

sentences.en: Go and muster all the men you can find.
sentences.cn: 去集合所有你能找到的人.

sentences.en: He beat Thomas Muster of Austria three sets to love.
sentences.cn: 他3比0直取奥地利的托马斯·蒙斯特。

sentences.en: He mustered out when the war ended.
His English up to this point would hardly pass muster.
sentences.cn: 他的英语到现在为止还未达到标准.

sentences.en: I could not pass muster in his language.
I couldn't muster up a single commonplace out of the thousand in my head.
sentences.cn: 我脑子里虽有千百句客套话,可是一句也 说 不出来.

sentences.en: I had to muster my courage up to ask him that question.
sentences.cn: 我必须鼓起勇气向他问那个问题.

sentences.en: If it doesn't pass muster, a radio station could have its license challenged.
sentences.cn: 如果不合要求，电台可能会被吊销执照。

sentences.en: In April 1185, he began to muster an army .
She mustered in at the age of 18.
Slipshod work will never pass muster.
sentences.cn: 草率的工作绝对经不起检查.

sentences.en: They passed muster with the sentries.
sentences.cn: 他们通过了哨兵们的检查.

sentences.en: Thirty thousand men were to muster.
this manifesto would not pass muster with the voters.
sentences.cn: 选民们对这个宣言不满意。

sentences.en: Where can we muster up more soldier?
sentences.cn: 我们到哪儿收募到更多的士兵 呢 ?

sentences.en: Where can we muster up more soldiers?
sentences.cn: 我们在哪儿可以召集更多的士兵?

words.tran_cn: 必须，一定；可以，应当；很可能
绝对必要的事物；未发酵葡萄汁
集合；检阅；点名册；集合人员

phrases.tran_cn: 被认为合格，被认为可以通得过

trans.tran_cn: 集合，集合的人群，检阅，花名册
trans.tran_en: a gathering together of soldiers so that they can be counted, checked etc
if soldiers muster, or if someone musters them, they come together in a group

trans.tran_cn: （自他人处）搜集某事物，聚集，激发，激起（支持、勇气等）
集合，召集，集结（尤指部队）
